metadata.title: CVE-2021-47614 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/irdma: Fix a user-after-free in add_pble_prm When irdma_hmc_sd_onefails, 'chunk' is freed while its still on the PBLE info list. Add thechunk entry to the PBLE info list only after successful setting of the SDin irdma_hmc_sd_one.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
